title: Voting Application
description: Developed a blockchain-based voting application using Ethereum, ensuring secure and transparent election processes.

title: Pharma Tracker
description: Developed a pharmacy tracker website using the MERN stack to help users locate medical shops for required medications.

title: OS Algorithm Simulator
description: Created a website showcasing four operating system algorithms - FIFO , Shortest Job First (SJF), Look/Clook, and Dining Philosopher.
